events.title: Bent Wheel
events.body: An abandoned wagon sits tilted in the path, its wheel badly bent. Salvageable supplies are scattered nearby, but repairing it could yield better rewards.

events.title: Scribe's Notes
events.body: Weathered pages flutter in the breeze, pinned beneath a rock. The handwriting is elegant but faded. These appear to be notes from a traveling scribe.

events.title: Forest Ambush
events.body: Rustling in the underbrush! Bandits emerge from the treeline, blocking your path. You could fight, flee, or try to negotiate.

events.title: Healing Herbs
events.body: A patch of medicinal herbs grows in a sunny clearing. Their leaves shimmer with morning dew.

events.title: Quiet Shrine
events.body: A small stone shrine stands in a grove of ancient oaks. Faded offerings rest at its base. The air feels peaceful here.

events.title: Lost Traveler
events.body: A weary traveler sits by the roadside, looking confused. They seem harmless but desperate for directions.

events.title: Hidden Cache
events.body: Behind a fallen log, you spot something glinting. A hidden cache of supplies, perhaps left by a previous expedition.

events.title: Standing Stone
events.body: An ancient monolith rises from the earth, covered in weathered runes. Power seems to emanate from within.

events.title: Wild Boar
events.body: A massive boar blocks the path ahead, pawing at the ground. Its tusks look sharp and dangerous.

events.title: Abandoned Camp
events.body: The remains of a campsite lie scattered about. A cold fire pit, torn canvas, and scattered belongings suggest a hasty departure.

events.title: Berry Bush
events.body: A bush laden with ripe berries catches your eye. They look delicious, but some forest berries can be dangerous.

events.title: Rich Ore Vein
events.body: Glittering metal ore streaks through the rock face. Mining it would take effort, but the yield looks promising.

events.title: Collapsed Tunnel
events.body: A tunnel entrance lies half-buried in rubble. Something glints within the darkness beyond.

events.title: Miner's Spirit
events.body: A translucent figure in miner's garb hovers near an old pickaxe. It gestures toward a shadowed alcove.

events.title: Rockslide
events.body: Loose stones tumble from above. Quick action might prevent injury, or you could salvage from the debris.

events.title: Tower Scout
events.body: An old scout occupies the watchtower. She offers information about enemy movements in exchange for supplies.

events.title: Bandit Lookout
events.body: Rough-looking men patrol the tower's base. They haven't noticed you yet.

events.title: Signal Fire
events.body: An unlit beacon stands ready atop the tower. Lighting it could summon help or attract danger.

events.title: Abandoned Armory
events.body: Rusted weapons and dented armor fill the tower's lower level. Some pieces might still be salvageable.

events.title: Cave Beast
events.body: Yellow eyes gleam from the darkness. A low growl echoes off the cave walls.

events.title: Crystal Formation
events.body: Luminescent crystals grow from the cave wall, casting eerie light. They pulse with faint energy.

events.title: Underground Spring
events.body: Fresh water bubbles from a crack in the stone. The pool looks clean and inviting.

events.title: Ancestor's Blessing
events.body: The cairn seems to shimmer as you approach. Ancient voices whisper on the wind.

events.title: Mountain Sage
events.body: An elderly hermit sits cross-legged on a flat stone, eyes closed in meditation. He seems aware of your presence.

events.title: Sunken Cargo
events.body: Waterlogged crates bob in the murky water near the dock. Most are ruined, but some look salvageable.

events.title: Fen Fisher
events.body: A weathered fisherman mends nets on the rotting dock. He eyes you with suspicion but not hostility.

events.title: Swamp Creature
events.body: Something large disturbs the water nearby. Bubbles rise and a scaled back briefly surfaces.

events.title: Fog Spirit
events.body: A spectral form coalesces from the mist, neither threatening nor welcoming. It waits.

events.title: Willow Whispers
events.body: The willows seem to sway without wind. Soft voices murmur secrets just beyond hearing.

events.title: Healing Waters
events.body: A clear pool lies hidden among the willows. Its waters shimmer with an inner light.

events.title: Swamp Witch
events.body: A crone watches you from the hut's doorway, stirring a bubbling cauldron. She beckons you closer.

events.title: Potion Trade
events.body: Various bottles and vials line makeshift shelves. Strange liquids bubble and glow within.

events.title: Dark Offering
events.body: The sunken altar radiates an unsettling energy. Strange symbols glow faintly on its surface.

input.text: place your gift upon the stone

events.title: Grain Stores
events.body: The windmill's storage room holds sacks of grain, though some show signs of rot.

events.title: Miller's Family
events.body: A family of refugees huddles in the windmill. They're frightened but have information to share.

events.title: Field Bandits
events.body: Desperate bandits have made camp in the fields. They look hungry but dangerous.

events.title: Harvest Festival
events.body: Local farmers have gathered for a small celebration. They welcome strangers with open arms.

events.title: Golden Apples
events.body: Perfectly ripe golden apples hang from ancient trees. Their sweet scent fills the air.

events.title: Champion's Challenge
events.body: A seasoned warrior awaits challengers in the arena. Victory promises both glory and rewards.

events.title: Training Grounds
events.body: Practice dummies and weapon racks fill the arena floor. A chance to hone your skills.

events.title: Veteran's Wisdom
events.body: An old soldier tends the monument, polishing names etched in stone. He has stories to tell.

events.title: Hero's Blessing
events.body: The monument glows faintly as you approach. The spirits of fallen heroes seem to stir.

events.title: Ancient Trial
events.body: A mystical stone tablet glows with power. Ancient runes demand a test of your typing prowess. Complete the trial to earn its blessing.

events.title: Shrine of Swiftness
events.body: A weathered shrine dedicated to the god of wind. The inscription reads: 'Prove your speed, earn my blessing.' Type quickly to receive the shrine's power.

events.title: Precision Stone
events.body: A perfectly smooth stone pillar rises from the ground. Carved into its surface: 'Only the precise may pass.' Your accuracy will be tested.

events.title: Forest Guardian
events.body: A massive treant blocks your path, its ancient eyes studying you. 'Prove your worth with words, traveler, or turn back.' This is a serious challenge.

events.title: Mystic Pool
events.body: A shimmering pool reflects the sky despite being deep in the marsh. Its surface ripples with arcane energy. Type the incantation to receive its power.

events.title: Wandering Merchant
events.body: A hooded merchant blocks the path with a knowing smile. 'I trade not in gold, but in wit. Answer my riddle with speed and precision, and my wares are yours.'
